title: A funny idea for Zyra
body:
It's just a thought, nothing serious.

What if she was reworked entirely, so that her seeds were invisible, and whenever someone stepped on one, the seeds around her sorta rose up and turned into those annoying turret-plants? It would be a pretty nice am_bush._

replies.body:
Invisible traps?

We already have this --->{{champion:17}} <--- guy making millions of people want to smash their keyboard into their screen.
Yeah, but less "Imminent doom, death and depression" and more actual traps, where they can still fight their way out if they're good enough.

The problem is they'd be like worse Shaco boxes.  Maybe if they applied a .25 or .5 sec root when spawning, but with 0 cc of their own, they'd have to do a lot of damage or be quite tanky (for traps) to work properly.
Well, there'd be a whole bunch of seeds around, so it'd be a bunch of worse shaco boxes.
